page.title: 04A Typical School Week
page.content: {English} and {French} what a drag but{ {Science} is great, it's not boring. We do experiments on testing inks and lots, lots more. Now{computers} put an end to our hate towards{Maths.}They have made it so easy to learn what we must.{Videos} and {films}we watch in a lesson then later the film brings help to the comprehension. We go on {school trips}roaming the place, maybe a week, maybe a day but what does it matter they're all great fun even the pamphlets which have to be done. Standing in the lesson,chanting "Good Morning", queuing in the{Tuck Shop,} waiting at the till to pay for your { {school meals,} that make us all feel ill.{Craft}is good now the boys can do {cooking}and girls{woodwork.}In the end we have something to show for the hard work we do that people don't know.
